speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is him. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi Mr. Thompson, my name is Kelly from XYZ Collections. I'm reaching out regarding your account. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming that. Could you also provide your current address for verification?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect, thank you. I see that you have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I will note that down. How would you like to make the payment today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can do it via credit card over the phone.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can assist you with that. Please provide your card details whenever you're ready.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay, it's a Visa card ending in 1234.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. I will process the payment now. Do you have any questions?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all clear. Thank you!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Thank you for your cooperation, Mr. Thompson. Have a great day!
